name: Dead of the Brain 1 & 2
description:
Dead of the Brain 1 & 2 (デッド・オブ・ザ・ブレイン１＆２) is a Adventure video game published by Fairy Tale released on June 3rd, 1999 for the TurboGrafx-CD.

Re-release of 2 games previously released on other platforms (PC98, FM Towns, MSX, etc) improved with voice acting and CD quality audio but with lower res graphics.

Contains 2 games:
Nightmare Collection: Dead of the Brain - Shiryou no Sakebi
Nightmare Collection: Dead of the Brain 2
